name: cybrlab-ai/url-scanner
title: CybrLab AI URL Security Scanner
description: Malicious URL detection for Safe Agentic Browsing.

headers.name: X-API-Key
headers.description: API key for authentication. Contact contact@cybrlab.ai to obtain one.

tools.name: url_scanner_scan
tools.description: Analyze a URL for security threats including phishing, malware, and suspicious patterns. Returns risk score, confidence, and agent access guidance.

url.description: The URL to analyze. Must be HTTP or HTTPS. If no scheme provided, https:// is assumed.

tools.name: url_scanner_scan_with_intent
tools.description: Analyze a URL for security threats with optional url visiting intent. Returns risk score, confidence, and agent access guidance.

url.description: The URL to analyze. Must be HTTP or HTTPS. If no scheme provided, https:// is assumed.

intent.description: Optional intent for visiting the URL. Recommended to provide additional context.
